meanings.definition: A person who takes part in an activity with another
meanings.sent1: My friend and I are parters in our school project.

meanings.sent5: The parters shared a special bond that made them a great team.

meanings.definition: To join or associate with others in a partnership
meanings.sent1: They decided to parters with a local business for the charity event.
